person.persName: Romeo Ezekiel North (Louisville, Kentucky, newspaper correspondent)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, newspaper correspondent. Bayou Lafourche, Louisiana, native. Son of Olivia North. Graduated from Yale College in 1849. Newspaper correspondent in Louisville in 1860. Member of the editorial staff of the Louisville Courier. Special correspondent for the New York Times. Member of the Jefferson County delegation to the Unconditional Union State Convention in Kentucky in 1864.
